Text: How do I play RMVB files? what programs can I use?
What program do I need to run the RMVB???

Cinema Player
K - Lite Mega Codec Pack

honestly, I hated Real Player and I like using Windows Media Player (plus VLC for anything else...don't like too many "extra programs" on my pc) but downloading these seasons or shows this quickly....heavenly.  No more 6 - 9 GB files to download....only 2 - 4 GB files.  

Whenever you go searching for seasons of shows, download the RMVB versions.  Faster to download and same quality (practically).
How do you put the swesub in the torrent?

Gud one...needs a little more seeds though!

Thanks for sharing!
